statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY username;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM transaction_details ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, phone_number, profile_picture FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, currency FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, currency, timestamp FROM transaction_details WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE balance > 1000.00;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_text, log_timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1' DAY;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, balance FROM user_profiles WHERE balance > 1000.00;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, date FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, balance FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND balance < 500.00;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, name, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE balance > 1000.00;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000.00;
SELECT u.username, w.balance FROM users u JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id WHERE w.balance < 0;
SELECT p.method_type, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM payment_methods p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY p.method_type;
